title: About Me
text:
Iâ€™m a data scientist with experience in machine learning, NLP, and applied analytics, currently working in the health insurance space. I previously worked as a consultant in a Big 4 healthcare practice, where I focused on data-driven strategy and analytics.
My technical interests include: - Machine learning systems - Retrieval and recommender systems - Natural language processing - Applied statistics and experimentation
This site is a living portfolio where I document projects, experiments, and technical writeups.
